plot: Filmmaker Chase Hook committed suicide on December 31st, 1979. His conservative family destroyed all of his films. Recently super8 home movies of his last summer on Fire Island were found. ...
title: Fire Island '79
plot_es: Filmmaker Chase Hook committed suicide on December 31st, 1979. His conservative family destroyed all of his films. Recently super8 home movies of his last summer on Fire Island were found. ...
